Home > Bath > All Bath Brands > Duravit>Toilets,https://www.kbauthority.com/duravit-002009-me-by-starck-removable-toilet-seat-and-cover-with-slow-close.html,"Duravit 0020090000 ME by Starck Removable Toilet Seat and Cover with Slow Close, Inside  White, Outside White",__@ 0020090000,__@ $114.26,__@ 26%,__@ $155.00,https://www.kbauthority.com/images/T/119/002009_Duravit.png,"Duravit 002009 ME by Starck Removable Toilet Seat and Cover with Slow Close

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Perfectly Designed Forms that are Neither Intrusive Nor Dominating, Therefore Leaving Ample Room for Both Individuality and Design. Products that Appear Perfectly Proportioned From Every Angle and can Simultaneously Fulfill Individual Ideas. Me by Starck is the Result and the Framework for Your Own Personal Style, Whether It be Pure, Elegant, Natural, Or Completely Individualistic.

The Me by Starck Bathroom Range, Designed for Duravit by the Renowned Philippe Starck, is Known for Its Streamlined Aesthetic and Countless Design Combinations. with the New Ada Compliant Configuration, Me by Starck Will Advance the Goal of the Entire Collection: to Offer Individualized Solutions for Any and Every Bathroom, with Design and Diversity in Mind. The Me by Starck One-Piece Toilet Combines the Collection’s Signature Slim Edge with a Widely-Appealing, Modern Design. Duravit's Innovative Rimless Flush Technology Ensures a Dynamic and Powerful Flow of Water that Rinses the Entire Inner Surface, While Allowing for Efficient and Hygienic Maintenance. Duravit Developed Technology to Reduce the Weight of the Toilets, Resulting in Sleek, Self-Contained Components that do Not Require Attachment Niches on the Sides. Following Ada Compliant Adjustments, the Me by Starck One-Piece Will be Available in a Higher Toilet Seat Height (17 3/8”) with the Option of a Left Or Right Side Lever for Flush Control.Now, Me by Starck is also Available in White Satin Matte.The Toilets are Available White (Glossy) Inside and White Satin Matte on the Outside, to Guarantee Optimum Hygiene.

column1: Inside White, Outside  White Satin Matte: 0020092600

Vero: the forms of this ceramic range are entirely restricted to the rectangle. It’s a restriction that gives rise to new possibilities: this is because Vero is one of the most versatile ceramic ranges of all time. With minimalist design at its core and the strong support of Duravit’s ceramic tradition and expertise, Vero is impressive in terms of its form, function and quality.

Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

column1: ",,,,,,,,__@ 04021534005954,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,__@ 1.6 Gpf,__@ Top,__@ Various series,,https://www.kbauthority.com/files/PDF/Duravit/Installation_Instructions_006420.pdf,,"It all began in Hornberg, Germany in 1817 when Georg Friedrich Horn built an earthenware factory initially focused solely on the manufacture of crockery. Frequently copied but never matched. The Starck 3 range is and remains the measure of all things when it comes to design, variety and price. Even more top-quality Starck at a great value: there’s no doubt that, with the Starck 3 range of ceramics, Duravit has revolutionized the sanitary world. Starck 3 brings design to a segment where it was once an untouched concept with a vast array of products that meet all needs and tastes. And – the range provides better value for money than ever before. With more than 50 models and 64 variants, Starck 3 is one of Duravit’s most extensive bathroom ranges. So, it only seems right that a range that offers so much requires its own brochure to illustrate its numerous applications, examples, and references.

column2: Features

column3: Length adjustable from 2-3/4"" to 8-1/4"" and vario connecting bend

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of numerous international design awards.These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Even more top-quality Starck at a great value: there’s no doubt that, with the Starck 3 range of ceramics, Duravit has revolutionized the sanitary world. Starck 3 brings design to a segment where it was once an untouched concept with a vast array of products that meet all needs and tastes. And – the range provides better value for money than ever before.

Archetypical bathroom design in the shape of a “D”: Why is Happy D. so successful"" Perhaps because the range is reasonably priced in spite of its high design quality. Perhaps because Happy D. is such a versatile bathroom range. Perhaps because the D-shaped washbasin is unmistakable. Happy D. is to bathroom design what Bauhaus is to architecture: simple, elegant and timelessly modern — a veritable icon that has gained many friends and numerous design prizes since it was introduced.

column2: Features

column1: HygieneGlaze - HygieneGlaze is not a surface coating. It is integrated into the ceramic glaze and then baked into the ceramic during firing, providing continuous protection with long-lasting effectiveness. Tests by the Institute for Hygiene and Public Health at the University of Bonn confirm that HygieneGlaze kills an almost unprecedented 99.9 % of germs. Antibacterial, durable, safe: with HygieneGlaze Duravit defines a new standard in bathroom hygiene. HygieneGlaze is optionally available for the toilets and urinals in the P3 Comforts and ME by Starck collections.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Perfectly Designed Forms that are Neither Intrusive Nor Dominating, Therefore Leaving Ample Room for Both Individuality and Design. Products that Appear Perfectly Proportioned From Every Angle and can Simultaneously Fulfill Individual Ideas. Me by Starck is the Result and the Framework for Your Own Personal Style, Whether It be Pure, Elegant, Natural, Or Completely Individualistic.

The Me by Starck Bathroom Range, Designed for Duravit by the Renowned Philippe Starck, is Known for Its Streamlined Aesthetic and Countless Design Combinations. with the New Ada Compliant Configuration, Me by Starck Will Advance the Goal of the Entire Collection: to Offer Individualized Solutions for Any and Every Bathroom, with Design and Diversity in Mind. The Me by Starck One-Piece Toilet Combines the Collection’s Signature Slim Edge with a Widely-Appealing, Modern Design. Duravit's Innovative Rimless Flush Technology Ensures a Dynamic and Powerful Flow of Water that Rinses the Entire Inner Surface, While Allowing for Efficient and Hygienic Maintenance. Duravit Developed Technology to Reduce the Weight of the Toilets, Resulting in Sleek, Self-Contained Components that do Not Require Attachment Niches on the Sides. Following Ada Compliant Adjustments, the Me by Starck One-Piece Will be Available in a Higher Toilet Seat Height (17 3/8”) with the Option of a Left Or Right Side Lever for Flush Control.Now, Me by Starck is also Available in White Satin Matte.The Toilets are Available White (Glossy) Inside and White Satin Matte on the Outside, to Guarantee Optimum Hygiene.
Available Finishes :

Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Perfectly Designed Forms that are Neither Intrusive Nor Dominating, Therefore Leaving Ample Room for Both Individuality and Design. Products that Appear Perfectly Proportioned From Every Angle and can Simultaneously Fulfill Individual Ideas. Me by Starck is the Result and the Framework for Your Own Personal Style, Whether It be Pure, Elegant, Natural, Or Completely Individualistic.

The Me by Starck Bathroom Range, Designed for Duravit by the Renowned Philippe Starck, is Known for Its Streamlined Aesthetic and Countless Design Combinations. with the New Ada Compliant Configuration, Me by Starck Will Advance the Goal of the Entire Collection: to Offer Individualized Solutions for Any and Every Bathroom, with Design and Diversity in Mind. The Me by Starck One-Piece Toilet Combines the Collection’s Signature Slim Edge with a Widely-Appealing, Modern Design. Duravit's Innovative Rimless Flush Technology Ensures a Dynamic and Powerful Flow of Water that Rinses the Entire Inner Surface, While Allowing for Efficient and Hygienic Maintenance. Duravit Developed Technology to Reduce the Weight of the Toilets, Resulting in Sleek, Self-Contained Components that do Not Require Attachment Niches on the Sides. Following Ada Compliant Adjustments, the Me by Starck One-Piece Will be Available in a Higher Toilet Seat Height (17 3/8”) with the Option of a Left Or Right Side Lever for Flush Control.Now, Me by Starck is also Available in White Satin Matte.The Toilets are Available White (Glossy) Inside and White Satin Matte on the Outside, to Guarantee Optimum Hygiene.

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

The Duravit product range would be incomplete without this classic, which was designed in the Golden Era and presented to the public for the first time in 1930. Over time, many charming pieces were added to 1930 Series to create the complete collection as we know it today.

And yet, however consistently classic its look, 1930 Series epitomizes cutting-edge technology — as exemplified by its wall-mounted toilet.The floorstanding Two-Piece toilet is available with a single flush 1.28 gpf.

column3: The classic for powder rooms and bathrooms
Suits modern, classical and elegant bathrooms
Coordinates with products from the 1930 Series line seamlessly
Two-piece configuration allows for easier access to the area around the toilet
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Toilet seat not included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 29-3/4"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)
Overall Depth: 26-3/8"" (furthest point back to front of toilet)
Overall Width: 16-1/2"" (furthest point left to furthest point right)
Bowl Height: 15"" (floor to the top of the bowl)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 6-1/4""

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

However, individuality does not mean making an impression with all means. Simply an ambiance which reflects itself, gives your personality air to breathe and space to do your own thing. Such as DuraStyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the range of bathrooms is revealed as deliberately discreet – and blends harmoniously into practically any ambiance for this very same reason.

The innovative impression given continues within the design of toilet and bidet: The flat seat & cover, available with and without a soft-close system, is eye-catching. Wall-mounted and freestanding toilets can also be combined with the shower-toilet seat SensoWash® DuraStyle by Starck. Ceramics and seat blend into a harmonious, elegant unit.The open design of the flushing rim enables an innovative water flow. Thanks to modern 4.5-l technology, perfect flushing results are guaranteed, even with only a small amount of water. Due to its open and easily accessible rim area, it is also considerably easier to keep the bowl clean.

column3: Price-conscious, versatile, perfect for any taste
Narrow bathtub rim with distinctive edge
Furniture solutions with a distinct lightness
A mix of open and closed fronts
Exciting combinations: light and dark decor wood tones
Rimless toilet with easy-care rim and hygienic flush
Coordinates with products from the DuraStyle line seamlessly
Two-piece configuration allows for easier access to the area around the toilet
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Toilet seat not included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 31-1/8"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)
Overall Depth: 27-1/2"" (furthest point back to front of toilet)
Overall Width: 15-3/8"" (furthest point left to furthest point right)
Bowl Height: 15-3/4"" (floor to the top of the bowl)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 5-7/8""

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of numerous international design awards.These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Happy D.2 is a complete bathroom solution that is just as chic, versatile and timelessly modern as its predecessor – and yet it’s also completely new. Because the series presents itself from a feminine side: this is achieved thanks to the fine radii of the rounded corners that feature throughout the bathroom program – and that give Happy D.2 its distinctive, archetypal design. No
doubt about it, Happy D.2 brings a new elegance into the bathroom.

Form and utility: toilets and bidets are available as wall-mounted, floor standing and back-to-wall options, both with and without the SoftClose seat function.The toilets can also be combined with the SensoWash® Starck shower-toilet seat.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Perfectly Designed Forms that are Neither Intrusive Nor Dominating, Therefore Leaving Ample Room for Both Individuality and Design. Products that Appear Perfectly Proportioned From Every Angle and can Simultaneously Fulfill Individual Ideas. Me by Starck is the Result and the Framework for Your Own Personal Style, Whether It be Pure, Elegant, Natural, Or Completely Individualistic.

The Me by Starck Bathroom Range, Designed for Duravit by the Renowned Philippe Starck, is Known for Its Streamlined Aesthetic and Countless Design Combinations. with the New Ada Compliant Configuration, Me by Starck Will Advance the Goal of the Entire Collection: to Offer Individualized Solutions for Any and Every Bathroom, with Design and Diversity in Mind. The Me by Starck One-Piece Toilet Combines the Collection’s Signature Slim Edge with a Widely-Appealing, Modern Design. Duravit's Innovative Rimless Flush Technology Ensures a Dynamic and Powerful Flow of Water that Rinses the Entire Inner Surface, While Allowing for Efficient and Hygienic Maintenance. Duravit Developed Technology to Reduce the Weight of the Toilets, Resulting in Sleek, Self-Contained Components that do Not Require Attachment Niches on the Sides. Following Ada Compliant Adjustments, the Me by Starck One-Piece Will be Available in a Higher Toilet Seat Height (17 3/8”) with the Option of a Left Or Right Side Lever for Flush Control.Now, Me by Starck is also Available in White Satin Matte.The Toilets are Available White (Glossy) Inside and White Satin Matte on the Outside, to Guarantee Optimum Hygiene.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Perfectly Designed Forms that are Neither Intrusive Nor Dominating, Therefore Leaving Ample Room for Both Individuality and Design. Products that Appear Perfectly Proportioned From Every Angle and can Simultaneously Fulfill Individual Ideas. Me by Starck is the Result and the Framework for Your Own Personal Style, Whether It be Pure, Elegant, Natural, Or Completely Individualistic.

The Me by Starck Bathroom Range, Designed for Duravit by the Renowned Philippe Starck, is Known for Its Streamlined Aesthetic and Countless Design Combinations. with the New Ada Compliant Configuration, Me by Starck Will Advance the Goal of the Entire Collection: to Offer Individualized Solutions for Any and Every Bathroom, with Design and Diversity in Mind. The Me by Starck One-Piece Toilet Combines the Collection’s Signature Slim Edge with a Widely-Appealing, Modern Design. Duravit's Innovative Rimless Flush Technology Ensures a Dynamic and Powerful Flow of Water that Rinses the Entire Inner Surface, While Allowing for Efficient and Hygienic Maintenance. Duravit Developed Technology to Reduce the Weight of the Toilets, Resulting in Sleek, Self-Contained Components that do Not Require Attachment Niches on the Sides. Following Ada Compliant Adjustments, the Me by Starck One-Piece Will be Available in a Higher Toilet Seat Height (17 3/8”) with the Option of a Left Or Right Side Lever for Flush Control.Now, Me by Starck is also Available in White Satin Matte.The Toilets are Available White (Glossy) Inside and White Satin Matte on the Outside, to Guarantee Optimum Hygiene.

column1: ",,,,,,,,__@ 04053424307237,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,__@ 0.92 GPF / 1.32 GPF,__@ Top,__@ ME by Starck,,https://www.kbauthority.com/files/PDF/Duravit/Installation_Instructions_002011.pdf,,"It all began in Hornberg, Germany in 1817 when Georg Friedrich Horn built an earthenware factory initially focused solely on the manufacture of crockery. column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Not Only in Its Literal Sense, but also in Terms of the French Word “Conforter” – to Strengthen. as Design Satisfies Very Fundamental Human Requirements for Appearance and Functionality, It also Demands to be Experienced by All the Senses. It is to be Seen, Touched and Used - to Address and Build the User's Emotions and Personality. P3 Comforts Satisfies these Needs, and does so with a Clean and Effortless Design.

The Generous Width of the Toilet Provides 3/4"" of Additional Seating Comfort, While Its Design Harmonizes Seamlessly with Matching P3 Comforts Washbasins.The Durafix Installation System for the Wall-Mounted Toilets Enhances This Smooth, Unified Look.The Innovative Water Flow Provided by Duravit Rimless Toilet Flushing Technology Ensures Outstanding Flushing Results, even when Using Only a Small Volume of Water. an Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area Allows for Easier Cleaning. for even Greater Comfort and Hygiene, the Toilet can also be Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat.The P3 Comforts Toilets are Available in Many Variations. Generous: + 3/4"" in Width Provide even More Seating Comfort.Nearly All of the Toilets can be Optionally Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat, which Offers Optimal Comfort and Hygiene.The Seat is Operated Via Remote Control, which Features All Basic Functions at a Glance – Comfort Wash, Lady Wash, Rear Wash, and Water Temperature and Spray Nozzle Adjustment. as with the Standard Toilets, the Soft Closure is Integrated Into Sensowash Slim.

Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Not Only in Its Literal Sense, but also in Terms of the French Word “Conforter” – to Strengthen. as Design Satisfies Very Fundamental Human Requirements for Appearance and Functionality, It also Demands to be Experienced by All the Senses. It is to be Seen, Touched and Used - to Address and Build the User's Emotions and Personality. P3 Comforts Satisfies these Needs, and does so with a Clean and Effortless Design.

The Generous Width of the Toilet Provides 3/4"" of Additional Seating Comfort, While Its Design Harmonizes Seamlessly with Matching P3 Comforts Washbasins.The Durafix Installation System for the Wall-Mounted Toilets Enhances This Smooth, Unified Look.The Innovative Water Flow Provided by Duravit Rimless Toilet Flushing Technology Ensures Outstanding Flushing Results, even when Using Only a Small Volume of Water. an Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area Allows for Easier Cleaning. for even Greater Comfort and Hygiene, the Toilet can also be Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat.The P3 Comforts Toilets are Available in Many Variations. Generous: + 3/4"" in Width Provide even More Seating Comfort.Nearly All of the Toilets can be Optionally Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat, which Offers Optimal Comfort and Hygiene.The Seat is Operated Via Remote Control, which Features All Basic Functions at a Glance – Comfort Wash, Lady Wash, Rear Wash, and Water Temperature and Spray Nozzle Adjustment. as with the Standard Toilets, the Soft Closure is Integrated Into Sensowash Slim.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

The Innovative Impression Given Continues Within the Design of Toilet and Bidet: the Flat Seat & Cover, Available with and Without a Soft-Close System, is Eye-Catching. Wall-Mounted and Freestanding Toilets can also be Combined with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Durastyle by Starck. Ceramics and Seat Blend Into a Harmonious, Elegant Unit.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Darling New is a Modern Bathroom Range for Individualists.The Harmonious Form, Filigree Edges and a Practical Design Language Combine to Produce a Timelessly Chic Bathroom with Limitless Possibilities. with Its Large Selection of Attractive Wood Decors and Plain Surfaces, Individual Washbasin Solutions and Friendly Prices, Darling New is the Perfect Answer for All Bathrooms.

Toilets and Bidets of the Darling New Series are Available as Floor Standing, Wall-Mounted and Back-To-Wall Versions.The Closed Sides with Invisible Attachment are Particularly Elegant.The Toilet Offering Includes a Us-Type One-Piece and Two-Piece.For Some Versions, the Wall-Mounted Models are Available with the Innovative Duravit Rimless Flushing Technology. for even More Hygiene You can also Add the Antibacterial Ceramic Glaze Hygieneglaze which Effectively Kills Bacteria and Germs, Or Chose a Maximum of Hygiene with a Matching Sensowash Slim Or Starck Shower-Toilet Seat.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean. Duravit has a New and Effective Answer to the Question of How to Improve Hygiene in Toilets and Urinals: Hygieneglaze.The Innovative Ceramic Glaze is Antibacterial: It Effectively Kills Bacteria and Germs.

Darling New is a Modern Bathroom Range for Individualists.The Harmonious Form, Filigree Edges and a Practical Design Language Combine to Produce a Timelessly Chic Bathroom with Limitless Possibilities. with Its Large Selection of Attractive Wood Decors and Plain Surfaces, Individual Washbasin Solutions and Friendly Prices, Darling New is the Perfect Answer for All Bathrooms.

Toilets and Bidets of the Darling New Series are Available as Floor Standing, Wall-Mounted and Back-To-Wall Versions.The Closed Sides with Invisible Attachment are Particularly Elegant.The Toilet Offering Includes a Us-Type One-Piece and Two-Piece.For Some Versions, the Wall-Mounted Models are Available with the Innovative Duravit Rimless Flushing Technology. for even More Hygiene You can also Add the Antibacterial Ceramic Glaze Hygieneglaze which Effectively Kills Bacteria and Germs, Or Chose a Maximum of Hygiene with a Matching Sensowash Slim Or Starck Shower-Toilet Seat.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean. Duravit has a New and Effective Answer to the Question of How to Improve Hygiene in Toilets and Urinals: Hygieneglaze.The Innovative Ceramic Glaze is Antibacterial: It Effectively Kills Bacteria and Germs.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Viu is a New Bathroom Series Inspiring with Soft, Organic Forms that Contrast with Precise Geometry. Sophisticated Details, Interesting Combinations of Materials, a Previously Unattainable Level of Perfection Right Down to the Last Detail, and Comfort-Enhancing Technologies Come Together to Produce a Harmonious Whole.Combine with the Viu and Duravit Rimless Wall-Mounted Toilet to Emphasize the Restrained Technological Doctrine of This New Bathroom Series.

Viu Offers a Wall-Mounted Toilet as a Perfect Solution for Confined Space Conditions. Metal Push Buttons Positioned on the Side Allow the Removal of the Seat Cover, Making Cleaning Easier. in Combination with Sensowash Slim Offers Viu the Perfect Shower-Toilet Solution in a Uniform Design.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

New Interpretation of Timeless Geometry: the Consistently Rectangular Design Language of the Vero Bathroom Range From 2001 is One of the Classics in the Duravit Program. and Now It's Time for Vero Air: Thanks to Today's Technical Options, Vero Air is a Complete Bathroom Collection that Combines the Unmistakable Character of the Original with a New Level of Precision and Perfect Proportions.

With Its New Rimless Technology, Duravit Demonstrates How Geometry, Fluid Mechanics and Design can be Successfully Combined for Maximum Efficiency. Thanks to the Open, Easily Accessible Rim Area, the Bowl is Particularly Easy to Keep Clean, and This Reduces Cleaning Times Considerably.The Innovative Ceramic Glaze is Antibacterial: It Effectively Kills Bacteria and Germs. Hygieneglaze is Not a Surface Coating. It is Integrated Into the Ceramic Glaze and Then Baked Into the Ceramic During Firing, Providing Continuous Protection with Long-Lasting Effectiveness. Tests by the Institute for Hygiene and Public Health at the University of Bonn Confirm that Hygieneglaze Kills an Almost Unprecedented 99.9 % of Germs. Antibacterial, Durable, Safe: with Hygieneglaze Duravit Defines a New Standard in Bathroom Hygiene. Hygieneglaze is Optionally Available for the Toilets and Urinals in the P3 Comforts and Me by Starck Collections.

Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

New Interpretation of Timeless Geometry: the Consistently Rectangular Design Language of the Vero Bathroom Range From 2001 is One of the Classics in the Duravit Program. and Now It's Time for Vero Air: Thanks to Today's Technical Options, Vero Air is a Complete Bathroom Collection that Combines the Unmistakable Character of the Original with a New Level of Precision and Perfect Proportions.

With Its New Rimless Technology, Duravit Demonstrates How Geometry, Fluid Mechanics and Design can be Successfully Combined for Maximum Efficiency. Thanks to the Open, Easily Accessible Rim Area, the Bowl is Particularly Easy to Keep Clean, and This Reduces Cleaning Times Considerably.The Innovative Ceramic Glaze is Antibacterial: It Effectively Kills Bacteria and Germs. Hygieneglaze is Not a Surface Coating. It is Integrated Into the Ceramic Glaze and Then Baked Into the Ceramic During Firing, Providing Continuous Protection with Long-Lasting Effectiveness. Tests by the Institute for Hygiene and Public Health at the University of Bonn Confirm that Hygieneglaze Kills an Almost Unprecedented 99.9 % of Germs. Antibacterial, Durable, Safe: with Hygieneglaze Duravit Defines a New Standard in Bathroom Hygiene. Hygieneglaze is Optionally Available for the Toilets and Urinals in the P3 Comforts and Me by Starck Collections.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

The Innovative Impression Given Continues Within the Design of Toilet and Bidet: the Flat Seat & Cover, Available with and Without a Soft-Close System, is Eye-Catching. Wall-Mounted and Freestanding Toilets can also be Combined with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Durastyle by Starck. Ceramics and Seat Blend Into a Harmonious, Elegant Unit.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

The Duravit Product Range Would be Incomplete Without This Classic, which Was Designed in the Golden Era and Presented to the Public for the First Time in 1930. over Time, Many Charming Pieces Were Added to 1930 Series to Create the Complete Collection as We Know It Today.

And Yet, However Consistently Classic Its Look, 1930 Series Epitomizes Cutting-Edge Technology — as Exemplified by Its Wall-Mounted Toilet.The Floorstanding Two-Piece Toilet is Available with a Single Flush 1.28 GPF.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Of Course, Good Design Isn’T Everything, But All the Same a Well-Designed Object Makes Life More Pleasant.Even more so If It is Affordable. D-Code From Duravit is a New Kind of Bathroom Range – Complete From Washbasin to Towel Rail, Consistently Designed Throughout and with an Excellent Value.

After All, Every Bathroom User Should be Able to Find Exactly the Product Needed for His Or Her Project, be It an Apartment Or Multi-Family Dwelling, an Office Or a Hotel, a Private, Semi-Public Or Open Area. Choices Range From Two Wall-Mounted Models, a Floorstanding Close-Coupled Toilet, One-Piece and a Two-Piece Toilets with the Appropriate Bidet.Special Requirements and Legal Regulations Apply to Barrier-Free Bathrooms.The Goal of the Facilities is to Allow Maximum Self-Sufficient Use.The D-Code One-Piece Toilet Fulfills Ada Height Requirements and is Available with a Left Or Right Hand Flush Lever.

Home > Bath > All Bath Brands > Duravit>Toilets,https://www.kbauthority.com/duravit-011701-d-code-13-3-4-x-27-inch-two-piece-toilet-elongated.html,"Duravit 0117010062 D-Code 13-3/4 x 27 Inch Two-Piece Toilet, Elongated Bowl Only, No Coating",__@ 0117010062,__@ $116.91,__@ 31%,__@ $170.00,https://www.kbauthority.com/images/T/33/586057_web2_prod_normal_2-01.jpg,"Duravit 011701 D-Code 13-3/4 x 27 Inch Two-Piece Toilet, Elongated Bowl Only

D-Code. The key to elegance in the bathroom. Of course, good design isn’t everything, but all the same a welldesigned object makes life more pleasant. All the more so if it is affordable. D-Code from Duravit is a new kind of bathroom range – complete from washbasin to towel rail, consistently designed throughout and excellent value for money. Its appearance is restrained, featuring rectangular forms with rounded edges – the classic washbasin shape, in fact, that does not impose itself but rather blends with its surroundings. This is what makes D-Code so timelessly modern – a hallmark of good design. With alternatives and solutions for all imaginable bathroom situations, D-Code is a bathroom range that many people have been waiting for – including you perhaps.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Of Course, Good Design Isn’T Everything, But All the Same a Well-Designed Object Makes Life More Pleasant.Even more so If It is Affordable. D-Code From Duravit is a New Kind of Bathroom Range – Complete From Washbasin to Towel Rail, Consistently Designed Throughout and with an Excellent Value.

After All, Every Bathroom User Should be Able to Find Exactly the Product Needed for His Or Her Project, be It an Apartment Or Multi-Family Dwelling, an Office Or a Hotel, a Private, Semi-Public Or Open Area. Choices Range From Two Wall-Mounted Models, a Floorstanding Close-Coupled Toilet, One-Piece and a Two-Piece Toilets with the Appropriate Bidet.Special Requirements and Legal Regulations Apply to Barrier-Free Bathrooms.The Goal of the Facilities is to Allow Maximum Self-Sufficient Use.The D-Code One-Piece Toilet Fulfills Ada Height Requirements and is Available with a Left Or Right Hand Flush Lever.

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Happy D.2 is a Complete Bathroom Solution that is Just as Chic, Versatile and Timelessly Modern as Its Predecessor – and Yet It’s also Completely New. Because the Series Presents Itself From a Feminine Side: This is Achieved Thanks to the Fine Radii of the Rounded Corners that Feature Throughout the Bathroom Program – and that Give Happy D.2 Its Distinctive, Archetypal Design. No Doubt About It, Happy D.2 Brings a New Elegance Into the Bathroom.

Form and Utility: Toilets and Bidets are Available as Wall-Mounted, Floor Standing and Back-To-Wall Options, Both with and Without the Softclose Seat Function.The Toilets can also be Combined with the Sensowash Starck Shower-Toilet Seat.

Happy D.2 is a Complete Bathroom Solution that is Just as Chic, Versatile and Timelessly Modern as Its Predecessor – and Yet It’s also Completely New. Because the Series Presents Itself From a Feminine Side: This is Achieved Thanks to the Fine Radii of the Rounded Corners that Feature Throughout the Bathroom Program – and that Give Happy D.2 Its Distinctive, Archetypal Design. No Doubt About It, Happy D.2 Brings a New Elegance Into the Bathroom.

Form and Utility: Toilets and Bidets are Available as Wall-Mounted, Floor Standing and Back-To-Wall Options, Both with and Without the Softclose Seat Function.The Toilets can also be Combined with the Sensowash Starck Shower-Toilet Seat.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

The Innovative Impression Given Continues Within the Design of Toilet and Bidet: the Flat Seat & Cover, Available with and Without a Soft-Close System, is Eye-Catching. Wall-Mounted and Freestanding Toilets can also be Combined with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Durastyle by Starck. Ceramics and Seat Blend Into a Harmonious, Elegant Unit.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Not Only in Its Literal Sense, but also in Terms of the French Word “Conforter” – to Strengthen. as Design Satisfies Very Fundamental Human Requirements for Appearance and Functionality, It also Demands to be Experienced by All the Senses. It is to be Seen, Touched and Used - to Address and Build the User's Emotions and Personality. P3 Comforts Satisfies these Needs, and does so with a Clean and Effortless Design.

The Generous Width of the Toilet Provides 3/4"" of Additional Seating Comfort, While Its Design Harmonizes Seamlessly with Matching P3 Comforts Washbasins.The Durafix Installation System for the Wall-Mounted Toilets Enhances This Smooth, Unified Look.The Innovative Water Flow Provided by Duravit Rimless Toilet Flushing Technology Ensures Outstanding Flushing Results, even when Using Only a Small Volume of Water. an Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area Allows for Easier Cleaning. for even Greater Comfort and Hygiene, the Toilet can also be Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat.The P3 Comforts Toilets are Available in Many Variations. Generous: + 3/4"" in Width Provide even More Seating Comfort.Nearly All of the Toilets can be Optionally Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat, which Offers Optimal Comfort and Hygiene.The Seat is Operated Via Remote Control, which Features All Basic Functions at a Glance – Comfort Wash, Lady Wash, Rear Wash, and Water Temperature and Spray Nozzle Adjustment. as with the Standard Toilets, the Soft Closure is Integrated Into Sensowash Slim.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Perfectly Designed Forms that are Neither Intrusive Nor Dominating, Therefore Leaving Ample Room for Both Individuality and Design. Products that Appear Perfectly Proportioned From Every Angle and can Simultaneously Fulfill Individual Ideas. Me by Starck is the Result and the Framework for Your Own Personal Style, Whether It be Pure, Elegant, Natural, Or Completely Individualistic.

The Me by Starck Bathroom Range, Designed for Duravit by the Renowned Philippe Starck, is Known for Its Streamlined Aesthetic and Countless Design Combinations. with the New Ada Compliant Configuration, Me by Starck Will Advance the Goal of the Entire Collection: to Offer Individualized Solutions for Any and Every Bathroom, with Design and Diversity in Mind. The Me by Starck One-Piece Toilet Combines the Collection’s Signature Slim Edge with a Widely-Appealing, Modern Design. Duravit's Innovative Rimless Flush Technology Ensures a Dynamic and Powerful Flow of Water that Rinses the Entire Inner Surface, While Allowing for Efficient and Hygienic Maintenance. Duravit Developed Technology to Reduce the Weight of the Toilets, Resulting in Sleek, Self-Contained Components that do Not Require Attachment Niches on the Sides. Following Ada Compliant Adjustments, the Me by Starck One-Piece Will be Available in a Higher Toilet Seat Height (17 3/8”) with the Option of a Left Or Right Side Lever for Flush Control.Now, Me by Starck is also Available in White Satin Matte.The Toilets are Available White (Glossy) Inside and White Satin Matte on the Outside, to Guarantee Optimum Hygiene.

column1: ",__@ Contemporary / Modern,,,__@ Whites,__@ Tank Only,,,__@ 04053424691848,,,,,,,__@ Floor Mounted,,,,__@ Dual Flush,__@ 14 to 15 Inches,,,,,,,,,,__@ 0.8 GPF / 1.6 GPF,__@ Top,__@ ME by Starck,,https://www.kbauthority.com/files/PDF/Duravit/093810.pdf,,"It all began in Hornberg, Germany in 1817 when Georg Friedrich Horn built an earthenware factory initially focused solely on the manufacture of crockery. column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

The Innovative Impression Given Continues Within the Design of Toilet and Bidet: the Flat Seat & Cover, Available with and Without a Soft-Close System, is Eye-Catching. Wall-Mounted and Freestanding Toilets can also be Combined with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Durastyle by Starck. Ceramics and Seat Blend Into a Harmonious, Elegant Unit.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean.

Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

The Innovative Impression Given Continues Within the Design of Toilet and Bidet: the Flat Seat & Cover, Available with and Without a Soft-Close System, is Eye-Catching. Wall-Mounted and Freestanding Toilets can also be Combined with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Durastyle by Starck. Ceramics and Seat Blend Into a Harmonious, Elegant Unit.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean.

This provided a platform for future success and also introduced the sanitary world to a new name: Duravit. column3: One-piece configuration provides a uniform look and simplifies installation
Elongated bowl provides extra comfort, extending out an extra 1-1/2"" compared to a round configuration
Covered under Duravit's 1 year limited warranty
Elongated bowl provides extra comfort, extending out an extra 1-1/2"" compared to a round configuration
Constructed of durable, easy to clean vitreous china
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
ADA compliant - complies with the standards set forth by the Americans with Disabilities Act for toilets
Comfort height - provides a higher seat, sometimes referred to as a handicapped toilet, it is designed for ease of use
Insulated tank - prevents condensate from forming on the outside of the toilet tank and ending up on the floor
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Overall Height: 28"" (measured from the bottom of the base to the highest point on the toilet)
Overall Length: 28-3/8"" (measured from the back of the tank to the front of the rim)
Overall Width: 16"" (measured from the furthest point on the left to the furthest on the right)
Bowl Height: 16"" (measured from the bottom of the base to the rim)
Water Area: 9-7/8"" x 14"" (inner rim dimensions length X width)
Tank Width: 16"" (measured from left most to right most points on tank)
Tank Length: 7-1/8"" (measured from back most to front most points on tank)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 5-1/2""

column2: Darling New is the evolution of a Duravit classic. Top end design without a top end price tag. The new range offers harmonious circular forms, an exquisite shape, individual washing area solutions, individual furniture fronts and a broad choice throughout the range. The basin and new vanity unit create a particularly attractive combination and the furniture washbasin offers impressively generous storage space with a delicate design, even in the smallest size. Darling New is the modern version of a bathroom classic; versatile, stylish and affordable.

Home > Bath > All Bath Brands > Duravit>Toilets,https://www.kbauthority.com/duravit-212501-starck-3-14-5-8-x-27-3-4-inch-two-piece-toilet-elongated.html,"Duravit 2125010000 Starck 3 14-5/8 x 27-3/4 Inch Two-Piece Toilet, Elongated, Bowl Only, No Coating",__@ 2125010000,__@ $171.48,__@ 30%,__@ $245.00,https://www.kbauthority.com/images/T/33/573227_web2_prod_normal_2-01.jpg,"Duravit 212501 Starck 3 14-5/8 x 27-3/4 Inch Two-Piece Toilet, Elongated, Bowl Only

Even more top-quality Starck at a great value: there’s no doubt that, with the Starck 3 range of ceramics, Duravit has revolutionized the sanitary world. Starck 3 brings design to a segment where it was once an untouched concept with a vast array of products that meet all needs and tastes. And – the range provides better value for money than ever before. With more than 50 models and 64 variants, Starck 3 is one of Duravit’s most extensive bathroom ranges. So, it only seems right that a range that offers so much requires its own brochure to illustrate its numerous applications, examples, and references.

Darling New is the evolution of a Duravit classic – top end design without a top end price tag. The new range offers harmonious circular forms, an exquisite shape, individual washing area solutions, individual furniture fronts and a broad choice throughout the range. The basin and new vanity unit create a particularly attractive combination and the furniture washbasin offers impressively generous storage space with a delicate design, even in the smallest size. Darling New is the modern version of a bathroom classic – versatile, stylish and affordable.

D-Code. The key to elegance in the bathroom. Of course, good design isn’t everything, but all the same a welldesigned object makes life more pleasant. All the more so if it is affordable. D-Code from Duravit is a new kind of bathroom range – complete from washbasin to towel rail, consistently designed throughout and excellent value for money. Its appearance is restrained, featuring rectangular forms with rounded edges – the classic washbasin shape, in fact, that does not impose itself but rather blends with its surroundings. This is what makes D-Code so timelessly modern – a hallmark of good design. With alternatives and solutions for all imaginable bathroom situations, D-Code is a bathroom range that many people have been waiting for – including you perhaps.

Home > Bath > All Bath Brands > Duravit>Toilets,https://www.kbauthority.com/duravit-216709-p3-comforts-15-x-25-5-8-inch-rimless-close-coupled-toilet-duravit.html,"Duravit 2167090092 P3 Comforts 15 x 25 5/8 Inch Rimless Close-Coupled Toilet Duravit, No Coating",__@ 2167090092,__@ $344.75,__@ 29%,__@ $485.00,https://www.kbauthority.com/images/T/38/216709_Duravit.png,"Duravit 216709 P3 Comforts 15 x 25 5/8 Inch Rimless Close-Coupled Toilet Duravit

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Not Only in Its Literal Sense, but also in Terms of the French Word “Conforter” – to Strengthen. as Design Satisfies Very Fundamental Human Requirements for Appearance and Functionality, It also Demands to be Experienced by All the Senses. It is to be Seen, Touched and Used - to Address and Build the User's Emotions and Personality. P3 Comforts Satisfies these Needs, and does so with a Clean and Effortless Design.

The Generous Width of the Toilet Provides 3/4"" of Additional Seating Comfort, While Its Design Harmonizes Seamlessly with Matching P3 Comforts Washbasins.The Durafix Installation System for the Wall-Mounted Toilets Enhances This Smooth, Unified Look.The Innovative Water Flow Provided by Duravit Rimless Toilet Flushing Technology Ensures Outstanding Flushing Results, even when Using Only a Small Volume of Water. an Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area Allows for Easier Cleaning. for even Greater Comfort and Hygiene, the Toilet can also be Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat.The P3 Comforts Toilets are Available in Many Variations. Generous: + 3/4"" in Width Provide even More Seating Comfort.Nearly All of the Toilets can be Optionally Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat, which Offers Optimal Comfort and Hygiene.The Seat is Operated Via Remote Control, which Features All Basic Functions at a Glance – Comfort Wash, Lady Wash, Rear Wash, and Water Temperature and Spray Nozzle Adjustment. as with the Standard Toilets, the Soft Closure is Integrated Into Sensowash Slim.

column1: Duravit 216709 P3 Comforts 15 x 25 5/8 Inch Rimless Close-Coupled Toilet Duravit

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Perfectly Designed Forms that are Neither Intrusive Nor Dominating, Therefore Leaving Ample Room for Both Individuality and Design. Products that Appear Perfectly Proportioned From Every Angle and can Simultaneously Fulfill Individual Ideas. Me by Starck is the Result and the Framework for Your Own Personal Style, Whether It be Pure, Elegant, Natural, Or Completely Individualistic.

The Me by Starck Bathroom Range, Designed for Duravit by the Renowned Philippe Starck, is Known for Its Streamlined Aesthetic and Countless Design Combinations. with the New Ada Compliant Configuration, Me by Starck Will Advance the Goal of the Entire Collection: to Offer Individualized Solutions for Any and Every Bathroom, with Design and Diversity in Mind. The Me by Starck One-Piece Toilet Combines the Collection’s Signature Slim Edge with a Widely-Appealing, Modern Design. Duravit's Innovative Rimless Flush Technology Ensures a Dynamic and Powerful Flow of Water that Rinses the Entire Inner Surface, While Allowing for Efficient and Hygienic Maintenance. Duravit Developed Technology to Reduce the Weight of the Toilets, Resulting in Sleek, Self-Contained Components that do Not Require Attachment Niches on the Sides. Following Ada Compliant Adjustments, the Me by Starck One-Piece Will be Available in a Higher Toilet Seat Height (17 3/8”) with the Option of a Left Or Right Side Lever for Flush Control.Now, Me by Starck is also Available in White Satin Matte.The Toilets are Available White (Glossy) Inside and White Satin Matte on the Outside, to Guarantee Optimum Hygiene.
