Home > Bath > All Bath Brands > Duravit>Toilets,https://www.kbauthority.com/duravit-217501-p3-comforts-15-x-28-inch-rimless-one-piece-toilet-1.28-gpf.html,"Duravit 2175010085 P3 Comforts 15 x 28 Inch Rimless One-Piece Toilet, 1.28 GPF, No Coating",__@ 2175010085,__@ $737.71,__@ 19%,__@ $915.00,https://www.kbauthority.com/images/T/38/217501_Duravit.png,"Duravit 217501 P3 Comforts 15 x 28 Inch Rimless One-Piece Toilet, 1.28 GPF

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Not Only in Its Literal Sense, but also in Terms of the French Word “Conforter” – to Strengthen. as Design Satisfies Very Fundamental Human Requirements for Appearance and Functionality, It also Demands to be Experienced by All the Senses. It is to be Seen, Touched and Used - to Address and Build the User's Emotions and Personality. P3 Comforts Satisfies these Needs, and does so with a Clean and Effortless Design.

The Generous Width of the Toilet Provides 3/4"" of Additional Seating Comfort, While Its Design Harmonizes Seamlessly with Matching P3 Comforts Washbasins.The Durafix Installation System for the Wall-Mounted Toilets Enhances This Smooth, Unified Look.The Innovative Water Flow Provided by Duravit Rimless Toilet Flushing Technology Ensures Outstanding Flushing Results, even when Using Only a Small Volume of Water. an Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area Allows for Easier Cleaning. for even Greater Comfort and Hygiene, the Toilet can also be Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat.The P3 Comforts Toilets are Available in Many Variations. Generous: + 3/4"" in Width Provide even More Seating Comfort.Nearly All of the Toilets can be Optionally Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat, which Offers Optimal Comfort and Hygiene.The Seat is Operated Via Remote Control, which Features All Basic Functions at a Glance – Comfort Wash, Lady Wash, Rear Wash, and Water Temperature and Spray Nozzle Adjustment. as with the Standard Toilets, the Soft Closure is Integrated Into Sensowash Slim.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

The Innovative Impression Given Continues Within the Design of Toilet and Bidet: the Flat Seat & Cover, Available with and Without a Soft-Close System, is Eye-Catching. Wall-Mounted and Freestanding Toilets can also be Combined with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Durastyle by Starck. Ceramics and Seat Blend Into a Harmonious, Elegant Unit.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean.

Happy D.2 is a Complete Bathroom Solution that is Just as Chic, Versatile and Timelessly Modern as Its Predecessor – and Yet It’s also Completely New. Because the Series Presents Itself From a Feminine Side: This is Achieved Thanks to the Fine Radii of the Rounded Corners that Feature Throughout the Bathroom Program – and that Give Happy D.2 Its Distinctive, Archetypal Design. No Doubt About It, Happy D.2 Brings a New Elegance Into the Bathroom.

Form and Utility: Toilets and Bidets are Available as Wall-Mounted, Floor Standing and Back-To-Wall Options, Both with and Without the Softclose Seat Function.The Toilets can also be Combined with the Sensowash Starck Shower-Toilet Seat.

Frequently copied but never matched. The Starck 3 range is and remains the measure of all things when it comes to design, variety and price. Even more top-quality Starck at a great value: there’s no doubt that, with the Starck 3 range of ceramics, Duravit has revolutionized the sanitary world. Starck 3 brings design to a segment where it was once an untouched concept with a vast array of products that meet all needs and tastes. And – the range provides better value for money than ever before. With more than 50 models and 64 variants, Starck 3 is one of Duravit’s most extensive bathroom ranges. So, it only seems right that a range that offers so much requires its own brochure to illustrate its numerous applications, examples, and references.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of numerous international design awards.These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Viu is a new bathroom series inspiring with soft, organic forms that contrast with precise geometry. Sophisticated details, interesting combinations of materials, a previously unattainable level of perfection right down to the last detail, and comfort-enhancing technologies come together to produce a harmonious whole.

Viu offers a wall-mounted toilet as a perfect solution for confined space conditions. Metal push buttons positioned on the side allow the removal of the seat cover, making cleaning easier. In combination with SensoWash Slim offers Viu the perfect shower-toilet solution in a uniform design.Combine with the Viu and Duravit Rimless® wall-mounted toilet to emphasize the restrained technological doctrine of this new bathroom series.

column3: Durafix for Concealed Fixation is Included

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Even More Top-Quality Starck at a Great Value: There’s No Doubt That, with the Starck 3 Range of Ceramics, Duravit has Revolutionized the Sanitary World. Starck 3 Brings Design to a Segment Where It Was Once an Untouched Concept with a Vast Array of Products that Meet All Needs and Tastes. and – the Range Provides Better Value for Money Than Ever Before.

The Toilet is an Essential Part of Every Bathroom. Reason Enough for Philippe Starck to Dedicate Just as Much Care to Its Design as to Any Other Item in the Range.The Wall-Mounted Toilet that is Closed at the Side Becomes a Distinctive Highlight.The Toilet is Available in Various Wall-Mounted and Floor Standing Versions and also in Combination with the Sensowash Starck Shower-Toilet Seat. Like All Duravit Toilets, It Features a Glazed and Thus Easy-Care Flushing Rim, as Well as a Single and Dual Flush Function (1.6 / 0.8 GPF).The Compact Wall-Mounted Toilets and Bidets Offer a Practical Solution for Smaller Rooms: with a Projection of Just 19 1/8"" (485 Mm), It Saves Valuable Space in the Bathroom.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Perfectly Designed Forms that are Neither Intrusive Nor Dominating, Therefore Leaving Ample Room for Both Individuality and Design. Products that Appear Perfectly Proportioned From Every Angle and can Simultaneously Fulfill Individual Ideas. Me by Starck is the Result and the Framework for Your Own Personal Style, Whether It be Pure, Elegant, Natural, Or Completely Individualistic.

The Me by Starck Bathroom Range, Designed for Duravit by the Renowned Philippe Starck, is Known for Its Streamlined Aesthetic and Countless Design Combinations. with the New Ada Compliant Configuration, Me by Starck Will Advance the Goal of the Entire Collection: to Offer Individualized Solutions for Any and Every Bathroom, with Design and Diversity in Mind. The Me by Starck One-Piece Toilet Combines the Collection’s Signature Slim Edge with a Widely-Appealing, Modern Design. Duravit's Innovative Rimless Flush Technology Ensures a Dynamic and Powerful Flow of Water that Rinses the Entire Inner Surface, While Allowing for Efficient and Hygienic Maintenance. Duravit Developed Technology to Reduce the Weight of the Toilets, Resulting in Sleek, Self-Contained Components that do Not Require Attachment Niches on the Sides. Following Ada Compliant Adjustments, the Me by Starck One-Piece Will be Available in a Higher Toilet Seat Height (17 3/8”) with the Option of a Left Or Right Side Lever for Flush Control.Now, Me by Starck is also Available in White Satin Matte.The Toilets are Available White (Glossy) Inside and White Satin Matte on the Outside, to Guarantee Optimum Hygiene.

The Me by Starck Bathroom Range, Designed for Duravit by the Renowned Philippe Starck, is Known for Its Streamlined Aesthetic and Countless Design Combinations. with the New Ada Compliant Configuration, Me by Starck Will Advance the Goal of the Entire Collection: to Offer Individualized Solutions for Any and Every Bathroom, with Design and Diversity in Mind. The Me by Starck One-Piece Toilet Combines the Collection’s Signature Slim Edge with a Widely-Appealing, Modern Design. Duravit's Innovative Rimless Flush Technology Ensures a Dynamic and Powerful Flow of Water that Rinses the Entire Inner Surface, While Allowing for Efficient and Hygienic Maintenance. Duravit Developed Technology to Reduce the Weight of the Toilets, Resulting in Sleek, Self-Contained Components that do Not Require Attachment Niches on the Sides. Following Ada Compliant Adjustments, the Me by Starck One-Piece Will be Available in a Higher Toilet Seat Height (17 3/8”) with the Option of a Left Or Right Side Lever for Flush Control.Now, Me by Starck is also Available in White Satin Matte.The Toilets are Available White (Glossy) Inside and White Satin Matte on the Outside, to Guarantee Optimum Hygiene.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Of Course, Good Design Isn’T Everything, But All the Same a Well-Designed Object Makes Life More Pleasant.Even more so If It is Affordable. D-Code From Duravit is a New Kind of Bathroom Range – Complete From Washbasin to Towel Rail, Consistently Designed Throughout and with an Excellent Value.

After All, Every Bathroom User Should be Able to Find Exactly the Product Needed for His Or Her Project, be It an Apartment Or Multi-Family Dwelling, an Office Or a Hotel, a Private, Semi-Public Or Open Area. Choices Range From Two Wall-Mounted Models, a Floorstanding Close-Coupled Toilet, One-Piece and a Two-Piece Toilets with the Appropriate Bidet.Special Requirements and Legal Regulations Apply to Barrier-Free Bathrooms.The Goal of the Facilities is to Allow Maximum Self-Sufficient Use.The D-Code One-Piece Toilet Fulfills Ada Height Requirements and is Available with a Left Or Right Hand Flush Lever.

column3: Complies with following standards: ASME A112.19.2/CSA B45.1 and ASME A112.19.14, Durafix for concealed fixation is included, For Starck 2 toilets manufactured before February 2012, the toilet seats without soft-close # 0066910000 and with soft-close # 0066990000 are suitable, In-wall tank & carrier and actuator plate required for installation / Refer to page XXX, Wall-mounted toilet is ADA compliant, when installed with a seat height of 17"" - 19"" from the finished floor

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

The Innovative Impression Given Continues Within the Design of Toilet and Bidet: the Flat Seat & Cover, Available with and Without a Soft-Close System, is Eye-Catching. Wall-Mounted and Freestanding Toilets can also be Combined with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Durastyle by Starck. Ceramics and Seat Blend Into a Harmonious, Elegant Unit.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

The Innovative Impression Given Continues Within the Design of Toilet and Bidet: the Flat Seat & Cover, Available with and Without a Soft-Close System, is Eye-Catching. Wall-Mounted and Freestanding Toilets can also be Combined with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Durastyle by Starck. Ceramics and Seat Blend Into a Harmonious, Elegant Unit.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean.

A modern new look! Darling New is the evolution of a Duravit classic – top end design without a top end price tag. The new range offers harmonious circular forms, an exquisite shape, individual washing area solutions, individual furniture fronts and a broad choice throughout the range. The basin and new vanity unit create a particularly attractive combination and the furniture washbasin offers impressively generous storage space with a delicate design, even in the smallest size. Darling New is the modern version of a bathroom classic – versatile, stylish and affordable.

Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Even More Top-Quality Starck at a Great Value: There’s No Doubt That, with the Starck 3 Range of Ceramics, Duravit has Revolutionized the Sanitary World. Starck 3 Brings Design to a Segment Where It Was Once an Untouched Concept with a Vast Array of Products that Meet All Needs and Tastes. and – the Range Provides Better Value for Money Than Ever Before.

The Toilet is an Essential Part of Every Bathroom. Reason Enough for Philippe Starck to Dedicate Just as Much Care to Its Design as to Any Other Item in the Range.The Wall-Mounted Toilet that is Closed at the Side Becomes a Distinctive Highlight.The Toilet is Available in Various Wall-Mounted and Floor Standing Versions and also in Combination with the Sensowash Starck Shower-Toilet Seat. Like All Duravit Toilets, It Features a Glazed and Thus Easy-Care Flushing Rim, as Well as a Single and Dual Flush Function (1.6 / 0.8 GPF).The Compact Wall-Mounted Toilets and Bidets Offer a Practical Solution for Smaller Rooms: with a Projection of Just 19 1/8"" (485 Mm), It Saves Valuable Space in the Bathroom

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Not Only in Its Literal Sense, but also in Terms of the French Word “Conforter” – to Strengthen. as Design Satisfies Very Fundamental Human Requirements for Appearance and Functionality, It also Demands to be Experienced by All the Senses. It is to be Seen, Touched and Used - to Address and Build the User's Emotions and Personality. P3 Comforts Satisfies these Needs, and does so with a Clean and Effortless Design.

The Generous Width of the Toilet Provides 3/4"" of Additional Seating Comfort, While Its Design Harmonizes Seamlessly with Matching P3 Comforts Washbasins.The Durafix Installation System for the Wall-Mounted Toilets Enhances This Smooth, Unified Look.The Innovative Water Flow Provided by Duravit Rimless Toilet Flushing Technology Ensures Outstanding Flushing Results, even when Using Only a Small Volume of Water. an Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area Allows for Easier Cleaning. for even Greater Comfort and Hygiene, the Toilet can also be Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat.The P3 Comforts Toilets are Available in Many Variations. Generous: + 3/4"" in Width Provide even More Seating Comfort.Nearly All of the Toilets can be Optionally Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat, which Offers Optimal Comfort and Hygiene.The Seat is Operated Via Remote Control, which Features All Basic Functions at a Glance – Comfort Wash, Lady Wash, Rear Wash, and Water Temperature and Spray Nozzle Adjustment. as with the Standard Toilets, the Soft Closure is Integrated Into Sensowash Slim.

The Generous Width of the Toilet Provides 3/4"" of Additional Seating Comfort, While Its Design Harmonizes Seamlessly with Matching P3 Comforts Washbasins.The Durafix Installation System for the Wall-Mounted Toilets Enhances This Smooth, Unified Look.The Innovative Water Flow Provided by Duravit Rimless Toilet Flushing Technology Ensures Outstanding Flushing Results, even when Using Only a Small Volume of Water. an Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area Allows for Easier Cleaning. for even Greater Comfort and Hygiene, the Toilet can also be Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat.The P3 Comforts Toilets are Available in Many Variations. Generous: + 3/4"" in Width Provide even More Seating Comfort.Nearly All of the Toilets can be Optionally Fitted with the Sensowash Slim Shower-Toilet Seat, which Offers Optimal Comfort and Hygiene.The Seat is Operated Via Remote Control, which Features All Basic Functions at a Glance – Comfort Wash, Lady Wash, Rear Wash, and Water Temperature and Spray Nozzle Adjustment. as with the Standard Toilets, the Soft Closure is Integrated Into Sensowash Slim.

column3: Connecting Elements for Sensowash with Concealed Connections Included

Home > Bath > All Bath Brands > Duravit>Toilets,https://www.kbauthority.com/duravit-256209-durastyle-basic-14-3-8-x-21-1-4-inch-wall-mounted-rimless-washdown-toilet-1.6-0.8-gpf.html,"Duravit 2562090092 DuraStyle Basic 14 3/8 x 21 1/4 Inch Wall-Mounted Rimless Washdown Toilet, 1.6/0.8 GPF, No Coating",__@ 2562090092,__@ $202.54,__@ 32%,__@ $300.00,https://www.kbauthority.com/images/T/152/256209_Duravit.png,"Duravit 256209 DuraStyle Basic 14 3/8 x 21 1/4 Inch Wall-Mounted Rimless Washdown Toilet, 1.6/0.8 GPF

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

The Innovative Impression Given Continues Within the Design of Toilet and Bidet: the Flat Seat & Cover, Available with and Without a Soft-Close System, is Eye-Catching. Wall-Mounted and Freestanding Toilets can also be Combined with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Durastyle by Starck. Ceramics and Seat Blend Into a Harmonious, Elegant Unit.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean.

column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Darling New is a Modern Bathroom Range for Individualists.The Harmonious Form, Filigree Edges and a Practical Design Language Combine to Produce a Timelessly Chic Bathroom with Limitless Possibilities. with Its Large Selection of Attractive Wood Decors and Plain Surfaces, Individual Washbasin Solutions and Friendly Prices, Darling New is the Perfect Answer for All Bathrooms.

Toilets and Bidets of the Darling New Series are Available as Floor Standing, Wall-Mounted and Back-To-Wall Versions.The Closed Sides with Invisible Attachment are Particularly Elegant.The Toilet Offering Includes a Us-Type One-Piece and Two-Piece.For Some Versions, the Wall-Mounted Models are Available with the Innovative Duravit Rimless Flushing Technology. for even More Hygiene You can also Add the Antibacterial Ceramic Glaze Hygieneglaze which Effectively Kills Bacteria and Germs, Or Chose a Maximum of Hygiene with a Matching Sensowash Slim Or Starck Shower-Toilet Seat.The Open Design of the Flushing Rim Enables an Innovative Water Flow. Thanks to Modern 4.5-L Technology, Perfect Flushing Results are Guaranteed, even with Only a Small Amount of Water. Due to Its Open and Easily Accessible Rim Area, It is also Considerably Easier to Keep the Bowl Clean. Duravit has a New and Effective Answer to the Question of How to Improve Hygiene in Toilets and Urinals: Hygieneglaze.The Innovative Ceramic Glaze is Antibacterial: It Effectively Kills Bacteria and Germs.

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

A true Starck, but less elaborate: this was the inspiration behind the second Duravit – Philippe Starck collaboration. The result: Starck 2, a range of ceramics that is the ultimate successor to its famous predecessor, Starck 1. Starck 2 also derives its inspiration from the origins of bathroom design: the ceramic forms embody the flowing movement of water and allow us to see the bathroom through a new set of eyes. Starck 2 – the bathroom as a source.

The sides of the Starck 2 toilet are completely closed, with no fastenings – seamless perfection, a feast for design lovers.  The toilet is available as a wall-mounted version, floorstanding version for in-wall cistern with matching bidet, floorstanding version with visible cistern and with the shower-toilet seat SensoWash® Starck.

column3: Coordinates with products from the Starck 2 line seamlessly
One-piece configuration provides a uniform look and simplifies installation
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Bidet seat included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 29-1/8"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)
Overall Depth: 28"" (furthest point back to front of toilet)
Overall Width: 14-3/4"" (furthest point left to furthest point right)
Bowl Height: 15-1/2"" (floor to the top of the bowl)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 5-1/2""

Home > Bath > All Bath Brands > Duravit>Toilets,https://www.kbauthority.com/duravit-d1909100-starck-3-1-28-gpf-two-piece-elongated-toilet-with-left-hand-lever-seat-included.html,Duravit D1909100 Starck 3 1.28 GPF Two-Piece Elongated Toilet with Left Hand Lever - Seat Included,__@ D1909100,__@ $317.72,__@  89%,__@ $2850.00,https://www.kbauthority.com/images/T/310/D1909100_Duravit.png,"Duravit D1909100 Starck 3 1.28 GPF Two-Piece Elongated Toilet with Left Hand Lever - Seat Included

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Even more top-quality Starck at a great value: there’s no doubt that, with the Starck 3 range of ceramics, Duravit has revolutionized the sanitary world. Starck 3 brings design to a segment where it was once an untouched concept with a vast array of products that meet all needs and tastes. And – the range provides better value for money than ever before.

The toilet is an essential part of every bathroom. Reason enough for Philippe Starck to dedicate just as much care to its design as to any other item in the range. The wall-mounted toilet that is closed at the side becomes a distinctive highlight.The toilet is available in various wall-mounted and floor standing versions and also in combination with the SensoWash® Starck shower-toilet seat.

Like all Duravit toilets, it features a glazed and thus easy-care flushing rim, as well as a single and dual flush function (1.6 / 0.8 gpf). The compact wall-mounted toilets and bidets offer a practical solution for smaller rooms: with a projection of just 19 1/8"" (485 mm), it saves valuable space in the bathroom.

column3: Coordinates with products from the Starck 3 line seamlessly
Two-piece configuration allows for easier access to the area around the toilet
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Toilet seat not included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 31-3/4"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)
Overall Depth: 27-1/2"" (furthest point back to front of toilet)
Overall Width: 14-3/4"" (furthest point left to furthest point right)
Bowl Height: 15-3/4"" (floor to the top of the bowl)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 5-1/2""

Reason enough for Philippe Starck to dedicate just as much care to its design as to any other item in the range.The wall-mounted toilet that is closed at the side becomes a distinctive highlight.The toilet is available in various wall-mounted and floor standing versions and also in combination with the SensoWash® Starck shower-toilet seat.

Like all Duravit toilets, it features a glazed and thus easy-care flushing rim, as well as a single and dual flush function (1.6 / 0.8 gpf).The compact wall-mounted toilets and bidets offer a practical solution for smaller rooms: with a projection of just 19 1/8"" (485 mm), it saves valuable space in the bathroom.

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Darling New is a modern bathroom range for individualists. The harmonious form, filigree edges and a practical design language combine to produce a timelessly chic bathroom with limitless possibilities. With its large selection of attractive wood decors and plain surfaces, individual washbasin solutions and friendly prices, Darling New is the perfect answer for all bathrooms.

Toilets and bidets of the Darling New series are available as floor standing, wall-mounted and back-to-wall versions. The closed sides with invisible attachment are particularly elegant. The toilet offering includes a US-type One-Piece and Two-Piece.For some versions, the wall-mounted models are available with the innovative Duravit Rimless® flushing technology. For even more hygiene you can also add the antibacterial ceramic glaze HygieneGlaze which effectively kills bacteria and germs, or chose a maximum of hygiene with a matching SensoWash® Slim or Starck shower-toilet seat.The open design of the flushing rim enables an innovative water flow. Thanks to modern 4.5-l technology, perfect flushing results are guaranteed, even with only a small amount of water. Due to its open and easily accessible rim area, it is also considerably easier to keep the bowl clean. Duravit has a new and effective answer to the question of how to improve hygiene in toilets and urinals: HygieneGlaze. The innovative ceramic glaze is antibacterial: it effectively kills bacteria and germs.

column3: Fresh bathroom design by sieger design: new forms, colors and finishes
Unique design of the washbasins, toilets and bidets with delicate edges
Solutions for small and large bathrooms
Coordinates with products from the Darling New line seamlessly
One-piece configuration provides a uniform look and simplifies installation
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Toilet Seat included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 28-3/8"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)
Overall Depth: 28-3/8"" (furthest point back to front of toilet)
Overall Width: 16"" (furthest point left to furthest point right)
Bowl Height: 15-3/4"" (floor to the top of the bowl)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 5-1/2""

Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Darling New is a modern bathroom range for individualists.The harmonious form, filigree edges and a practical design language combine to produce a timelessly chic bathroom with limitless possibilities. With its large selection of attractive wood decors and plain surfaces, individual washbasin solutions and friendly prices, Darling New is the perfect answer for all bathrooms.

Toilets and bidets of the Darling New series are available as floor standing, wall-mounted and back-to-wall versions.The closed sides with invisible attachment are particularly elegant.The toilet offering includes a US-type One-Piece and Two-Piece.For some versions, the wall-mounted models are available with the innovative Duravit Rimless® flushing technology. for even more hygiene you can also add the antibacterial ceramic glaze HygieneGlaze which effectively kills bacteria and germs, or chose a maximum of hygiene with a matching SensoWash® Slim or Starck shower-toilet seat.The open design of the flushing rim enables an innovative water flow. Thanks to modern 4.5-l technology, perfect flushing results are guaranteed, even with only a small amount of water. Due to its open and easily accessible rim area, it is also considerably easier to keep the bowl clean. Duravit has a new and effective answer to the question of how to improve hygiene in toilets and urinals: HygieneGlaze.The innovative ceramic glaze is antibacterial: it effectively kills bacteria and germs.

column3: Fresh bathroom design by sieger design: new forms, colors and finishes
Unique design of the washbasins, toilets and bidets with delicate edges
Solutions for small and large bathrooms
Coordinates with products from the Darling New line seamlessly
One-piece configuration provides a uniform look and simplifies installation
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Bidet seat included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 28"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)
Overall Depth: 28-3/8"" (furthest point back to front of toilet)
Overall Width: 16"" (furthest point left to furthest point right)
Bowl Height: 16"" (floor to the top of the bowl)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 5-1/2""

Of course, good design isn’t everything, but all the same a well-designed object makes life more pleasant.Even more so If It is Affordable. D-Code from Duravit is a new kind of bathroom range – complete from washbasin to towel rail, consistently designed throughout and with an excellent value.

After all, every bathroom user should be able to find exactly the product needed for his or her project, be it an apartment or multi-family dwelling, an office or a hotel, a private, semi-public or open area. Choices range from two wall-mounted models, a floorstanding close-coupled toilet, One-Piece and a Two-Piece toilets with the appropriate bidet.Special requirements and legal regulations apply to barrier-free bathrooms.The goal of the facilities is to allow maximum self-sufficient use.The D-Code One-Piece toilet fulfills ADA height requirements and is available with a left or right hand flush lever.

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

However, individuality does not mean making an impression with all means. Simply an ambiance which reflects itself, gives your personality air to breathe and space to do your own thing. Such as DuraStyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the range of bathrooms is revealed as deliberately discreet – and blends harmoniously into practically any ambiance for this very same reason.

The innovative impression given continues within the design of toilet and bidet: The flat seat & cover, available with and without a soft-close system, is eye-catching. Wall-mounted and freestanding toilets can also be combined with the shower-toilet seat SensoWash® DuraStyle by Starck. Ceramics and seat blend into a harmonious, elegant unit.The open design of the flushing rim enables an innovative water flow. Thanks to modern 4.5-l technology, perfect flushing results are guaranteed, even with only a small amount of water. Due to its open and easily accessible rim area, it is also considerably easier to keep the bowl clean.

column3: Price-conscious, versatile, perfect for any taste
Narrow bathtub rim with distinctive edge
Furniture solutions with a distinct lightness
A mix of open and closed fronts
Exciting combinations: light and dark decor wood tones
Rimless toilet with easy-care rim and hygienic flush
Coordinates with products from the DuraStyle line seamlessly
Two-piece configuration allows for easier access to the area around the toilet
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability

column1: Duravit D4051900 DuraStyle 1.28 GPF Two-Piece Elongated Toilet with Top Flush Button - Less Seat

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

However, individuality does not mean making an impression with all means. Simply an ambiance which reflects itself, gives your personality air to breathe and space to do your own thing. Such as DuraStyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the range of bathrooms is revealed as deliberately discreet – and blends harmoniously into practically any ambiance for this very same reason.

The innovative impression given continues within the design of toilet and bidet: The flat seat & cover, available with and without a soft-close system, is eye-catching. Wall-mounted and freestanding toilets can also be combined with the shower-toilet seat SensoWash® DuraStyle by Starck. Ceramics and seat blend into a harmonious, elegant unit.The open design of the flushing rim enables an innovative water flow. Thanks to modern 4.5-l technology, perfect flushing results are guaranteed, even with only a small amount of water. Due to its open and easily accessible rim area, it is also considerably easier to keep the bowl clean.

column3: Price-conscious, versatile, perfect for any taste
Narrow bathtub rim with distinctive edge
Furniture solutions with a distinct lightness
A mix of open and closed fronts
Exciting combinations: light and dark decor wood tones
Rimless toilet with easy-care rim and hygienic flush
Coordinates with products from the DuraStyle line seamlessly
Two-piece configuration allows for easier access to the area around the toilet
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Toilet seat not included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 31-1/8"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)
Overall Depth: 27-1/2"" (furthest point back to front of toilet)
Overall Width: 15-3/8"" (furthest point left to furthest point right)
Bowl Height: 15-3/4"" (floor to the top of the bowl)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 5-1/2""

Thanks to modern 4.5-l technology, perfect flushing results are guaranteed, even with only a small amount of water. Due to its open and easily accessible rim area, it is also considerably easier to keep the bowl clean.

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Happy D.2 is a complete bathroom solution that is just as chic, versatile and timelessly modern as its predecessor – and yet it’s also completely new. Because the series presents itself from a feminine side: this is achieved thanks to the fine radii of the rounded corners that feature throughout the bathroom program – and that give Happy D.2 its distinctive, archetypal design. No
doubt about it, Happy D.2 brings a new elegance into the bathroom.

Form and utility: toilets and bidets are available as wall-mounted, floor standing and back-to-wall options, both with and without the SoftClose seat function. The toilets can also be combined with the SensoWash® Starck shower-toilet seat.

column3: Feminine and chic, delicate & elegant sieger design’s new take on an archetype
The washbasin and furniture contours are in perfect harmony
Decor, real-wood and textile melamine finishe
Coordinates with products from the Happy D.2 line seamlessly
Two-piece configuration allows for easier access to the area around the toilet
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Toilet seat not included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 31-1/2"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)

Form and utility: toilets and bidets are available as wall-mounted, floor standing and back-to-wall options, both with and without the SoftClose seat function. The toilets can also be combined with the SensoWash® Starck shower-toilet seat.

column3: Feminine and chic, delicate & elegant sieger design’s new take on an archetype
The washbasin and furniture contours are in perfect harmony
Decor, real-wood and textile melamine finishe
Coordinates with products from the Happy D.2 line seamlessly
One-piece configuration provides a uniform look and simplifies installation
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability

column1: Duravit D4102200 Happy D.2 0.92/1.32 GPF Dual-Flush One Piece Elongated Toilet with Top Flush Button - Washlet Seat Included

column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Happy D.2 is a complete bathroom solution that is just as chic, versatile and timelessly modern as its predecessor – and yet it’s also completely new. Because the series presents itself from a feminine side: this is achieved thanks to the fine radii of the rounded corners that feature throughout the bathroom program – and that give Happy D.2 its distinctive, archetypal design. No
doubt about it, Happy D.2 brings a new elegance into the bathroom.

Form and utility: toilets and bidets are available as wall-mounted, floor standing and back-to-wall options, both with and without the SoftClose seat function. The toilets can also be combined with the SensoWash® Starck shower-toilet seat.

column1: ",__@ Contemporary / Modern,,,__@ Whites,__@ One Piece,,,__@ 04053424911069,,,,,,__@ Elongated,__@ Floor Mounted,,,,__@ Dual Flush,__@ 14 to 15 Inches,,__@ 28 to 29 Inches,,,,,,,,__@ 0.92 GPF / 1.32 GPF,__@ Top,__@ Happy D.2,,https://www.kbauthority.com/files/PDF/Duravit/Installation_Instructions_D41022.pdf,,"It all began in Hornberg, Germany in 1817 when Georg Friedrich Horn built an earthenware factory initially focused solely on the manufacture of crockery. column2: Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of numerous international design awards.These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Perfectly designed forms that are neither intrusive nor dominating, therefore leaving ample room for both individuality and design. Products that appear perfectly proportioned from every angle and can simultaneously fulfill individual ideas. ME by Starck is the result and the framework for your own personal style, whether it be pure, elegant, natural, or completely individualistic.

The ME by Starck bathroom range, designed for Duravit by the renowned Philippe Starck, is known for its streamlined aesthetic and countless design combinations. With the new ADA compliant configuration, ME by Starck will advance the goal of the entire collection: to offer individualized solutions for any and every bathroom, with design and diversity in mind.

The ME by Starck One-Piece toilet combines the collection’s signature slim edge with a widely-appealing, modern design. Duravit's innovative Rimless® flush technology ensures a dynamic and powerful flow of water that rinses the entire inner surface, while allowing for efficient and hygienic maintenance. Duravit developed technology to reduce the weight of the toilets, resulting in sleek, self-contained components that do not require attachment niches on the sides. Following ADA compliant adjustments, the ME by Starck one-piece will be available in a higher toilet seat height (17 3/8”) with the option of a left or right side lever for flush control.Now, ME by Starck is also available in White Satin Matte.The toilets are available White (glossy) inside and White Satin Matte on the outside, to guarantee optimum hygiene.

Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Toilet seat not included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 30-7/8"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)

Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Perfectly designed forms that are neither intrusive nor dominating, therefore leaving ample room for both individuality and design. Products that appear perfectly proportioned from every angle and can simultaneously fulfill individual ideas. ME by Starck is the result and the framework for your own personal style, whether it be pure, elegant, natural, or completely individualistic.

The ME by Starck bathroom range, designed for Duravit by the renowned Philippe Starck, is known for its streamlined aesthetic and countless design combinations. With the new ADA compliant configuration, ME by Starck will advance the goal of the entire collection: to offer individualized solutions for any and every bathroom, with design and diversity in mind.

The ME by Starck One-Piece toilet combines the collection’s signature slim edge with a widely-appealing, modern design. Duravit's innovative Rimless® flush technology ensures a dynamic and powerful flow of water that rinses the entire inner surface, while allowing for efficient and hygienic maintenance. Duravit developed technology to reduce the weight of the toilets, resulting in sleek, self-contained components that do not require attachment niches on the sides. Following ADA compliant adjustments, the ME by Starck one-piece will be available in a higher toilet seat height (17 3/8”) with the option of a left or right side lever for flush control.Now, ME by Starck is also available in White Satin Matte. The toilets are available White (glossy) inside and White Satin Matte on the outside, to guarantee optimum hygiene.

column3: Coordinates with products from the ME by Starck line seamlessly
One-piece configuration provides a uniform look and simplifies installation
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Toilet Seat included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 28-7/8"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)
Overall Depth: 28-3/4"" (furthest point back to front of toilet)
Overall Width: 15-3/8"" (furthest point left to furthest point right)
Bowl Height: 16-1/2"" (floor to the top of the bowl)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 5-1/2""

column1: ",__@ Contemporary / Modern,,,__@ Whites,__@ One Piece,,,__@ 04053424911083,,,,,,__@ Elongated,__@ Floor Mounted,,,,,__@ 14 to 15 Inches,,__@ 28 to 29 Inches,,,,,,,,__@ 1.28 GPF,__@ Top,__@ ME by Starck,,https://www.kbauthority.com/files/PDF/Duravit/Care_Instructions_D42019.pdf,,"It all began in Hornberg, Germany in 1817 when Georg Friedrich Horn built an earthenware factory initially focused solely on the manufacture of crockery. column2: Duravit has been the proud recipient of numerous international design awards. These awards celebrate bold design, which has become Duravit’s hallmark over the years.Each Duravit designer is a specialist in his field – a prominent global innovator with an inherent sense for good design. Good design, as Duravit and its designers see it, is never at the expense of practicality – neither is interested in “design for design’s sake”.That’s you, the bathroom user, and your own set of needs and requirements. Thanks to an ongoing dialogue with its trade partners and sanitary ware dealers, Duravit is best able to address these needs and requirements in the brand’s designs. Simply put, Duravit recognizes good bathroom design by the fact that it seems specially-created to suit all individual tastes.This fusion of Duravit’s environmentally-friendly production technologies with the company’s meticulous quality control results in products that are highly functional and long-lasting.At Duravit, sustainable materials, modern expertise and the foresight to recognize what will be important tomorrow comprise the essential ingredients for beautiful – and responsible – living bathrooms.

Not only in its literal sense, but also in terms of the French word “conforter” – to strengthen. As design satisfies very fundamental human requirements for appearance and functionality, it also demands to be experienced by all the senses. It is to be seen, touched and used - to address and build the user's emotions and personality. P3 Comforts satisfies these needs, and does so with a clean and effortless design.

The generous width of the toilet provides 3/4"" of additional seating comfort, while its design harmonizes seamlessly with matching P3 Comforts washbasins. The DuraFix installation system for the wall-mounted toilets enhances this smooth, unified look. The innovative water flow provided by Duravit Rimless® toilet flushing technology ensures outstanding flushing results, even when using only a small volume of water. An open and easily accessible rim area allows for easier cleaning. For even greater comfort and hygiene, the toilet can also be fitted with the SensoWash® Slim shower-toilet seat.The P3 Comforts toilets are available in many variations. Generous: + 3/4"" in width provide even more seating comfort.Nearly all of the toilets can be optionally fitted with the SensoWash® Slim shower-toilet seat, which offers optimal comfort and hygiene. The seat is operated via remote control, which features all basic functions at a glance – comfort wash, lady wash, rear wash, and water temperature and spray nozzle adjustment. As with the standard toilets, the soft closure is integrated into SensoWash® Slim.

column3: Coordinates with products from the P3 Comforts line seamlessly
Two-piece configuration allows for easier access to the area around the toilet
Installs in a floor mounted configuration
Top of tank push button flush
Constructed of ceramic ensuring dependability and durability
Concealed trapway - provides a smoother and less utilitarian appearance, a built in skirt hides the discharge passageway from view
Toilet seat not included with this product
WaterSense certified - toilet uses 20% less water than the current standard while maintaining superior performance
Overall Height: 32-1/8"" (from bottom of the base to the highest point of the toilet)
Overall Depth: 28"" (furthest point back to front of toilet)
Overall Width: 15"" (furthest point left to furthest point right)
Bowl Height: 16-1/2"" (floor to the top of the bowl)
Distance Between Toilet Seat Installation Holes: 5-1/2""

Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

A True Starck, But Less Elaborate: This Was the Inspiration Behind the Second Duravit – Philippe Starck Collaboration.The Result: Starck 2, a Range of Ceramics that is the Ultimate Successor to Its Famous Predecessor, Starck 1. Starck 2 also Derives Its Inspiration From the Origins of Bathroom Design: the Ceramic Forms Embody the Flowing Movement of Water and Allow Us to See the Bathroom Through a New Set of Eyes. Starck 2 – the Bathroom as a Source.

The Sides of the Starck 2 Toilet are Completely Closed, with No Fastenings – Seamless Perfection, a Feast for Design Lovers.The Toilet is Available as a Wall-Mounted Version, Floorstanding Version for In-Wall Cistern with Matching Bidet, Floorstanding Version with Visible Cistern and with the Shower-Toilet Seat Sensowash Starck.

column1: ",,,,,,,,__@ 04021534168314,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,__@ 1.28 GPF,__@ Top,__@ Various series,,,,"It all began in Hornberg, Germany in 1817 when Georg Friedrich Horn built an earthenware factory initially focused solely on the manufacture of crockery. In 1956, production evolved from earthenware to porcelain, extending the product range to include sanitary ceramics. This provided a platform for future success and also introduced the sanitary world to a new name: Duravit. Today, Duravit AG operates at an international level and boasts 10 production plants with a workforce of more than 5,000 employees worldwide.",__@ ADA Compliant / Seat Included
